title: Emerald Vaagai Jhumka - Traditional Elegance with a Modern Twist
features: Exquisite Jhumka design featuring a central, vivid green Emerald cabochon surrounded by a floral halo of uncut Polki diamonds. The Jhumka incorporates a square-shaped Polki design at the top. The gold setting showcases intricate filigree work and a rich, lustrous Hyderabadi polish, enhancing the antique aesthetic. A delicate droplet design connects the top piece with the main jhumka component.
colors: Primarily gold with brilliant white Polki diamonds and a vibrant emerald green centerpiece.
occasions: and festive celebrations. Equally stunning paired with contemporary evening wear for a touch of regal elegance.
description: This Jhumka embodies the timeless beauty of South Indian jewelry, meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad. The combination of uncut Polki diamonds and a vibrant emerald creates a captivating contrast. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability. A symbol of prosperity and tradition, this piece is an investment in enduring style and cultural heritage. The use of natural emerald signifies growth and renewal, making it an auspicious choice.
